attributes.action: 16 year olds to get paid the same wage as adults
attributes.additional_details: Benefits is a high risk in the UK and taxes are really difficult to pay for and our parents need help but they have no one to help them .
attributes.background:
Many parents are suffering and they would like their children to help for example some parents are on benefits and they need help.

I think this would be great because 16 year old will then have a experience to work hard in school so they don't be like their parents or care.
